text: Aludɨ 3.14 Mt 7.19, Ef 4.28, Fl 1.11, Kl 1.10, Ta 2.14 kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlaŋ salaku ukaci vivi saŋ lɨhavɨm uamalɨ. Salaku ukaci agɨladɨ vibiŋ kulaŋ iamɨgali acaba acaba saŋ tɨbɨ mɨgavɨdɨ agɨladɨ aveji akɨliakuavɨm uamalɨ. Haman ma lɨhavɨci kulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiakavalɨ agɨlaŋ kulaŋ kavɨ me hɨnevɨdɨ uamalɨ. Nulɨdɨ hɨnihɨni hɨdahɨda agɨlaŋ kualabɨla sɨmɨŋ apalɨ me hɨnevɨdɨ uamalɨ.
